comment:
Nose- caramel apples, dill, black pepper, baking spices, rye bread

Palate- Sweet apples, green jolly rancher, pineapple, gingerbread, caramel, light toasted oak, french vanilla

Finish- long, chewy finish with notes of rye bread, vanilla, and baking spices

OUTSTANDING. This is one of the top bourbons ive ever tried. The nose is beautiful, light and balanced- while still being very complex. The palate is amazing. Super unique, with notes of pineapple and green jolly ranchers- something i’ve never got in a bourbon before. My only complaint is I don’t have more.
